mapper.sql: select rv.rvno, rv.stcno, rv.mno, rv.txt, rv.txt_x, rv.txt_y, rv.tfno, rv.txt_size, rv.rdt, rv.mdt, rv.stat, from acv_rv rv

select rv.rvno, m.nick, m.intro, rv.rdt, mv.mvno, mv.title mvTitle, tp.tno, t.title, rv.txt, rv.stat from acv_rv rv inner join acv_mbr m on rv.mno=m.mno inner join acv_stc s on rv.stcno=s.stcno inner join acv_mov mv on s.mvno=mv.mvno left outer join acv_tag_post tp on rv.rvno=tp.rvno left outer join acv_tag t on tp.tno=t.tno
mapper.select: where rv.rvno = #{rvno} order by rv.rvno desc
where rv.mno = #{mno} and rv.stat = 1 order by rv.rvno desc

select rv.rvno, rv.mno, rv.txt, rv.txt_x, rv.txt_y, rv.tfno, rv.txt_size, rv.rdt, rv.stat, s.stc_url, m.photo, m.nick, mv.title mvTitle, t.title, t.stat, f.fno, lk_length from (select * from acv_rv order by rdt desc limit #{row}, 5)rv left outer join acv_stc s on rv.stcno=s.stcno inner join acv_mbr m on rv.mno=m.mno left outer join acv_mov mv on s.mvno=mv.mvno left outer join acv_tag_post tp on tp.rvno=rv.rvno left outer join acv_tag t on tp.tno=t.tno left outer join (select fno, target from acv_flw where flwing_mbr=#{userNo} and fano=1)f on f.target=rv.mno left outer join (select target, lano, count(*) lk_length from acv_like where lano=1 group by lano, target)lk on lk.target=rv.rvno

select rv.rvno, rv.mno, rv.txt, rv.txt_x, rv.txt_y, rv.tfno, rv.txt_size, rv.rdt, rv.stat, s.stc_url, m.photo, m.nick, mv.title mvTitle, t.title, t.stat, f.fno, lk_length from (select * from acv_rv order by rdt desc limit #{row}, 5)rv left outer join acv_stc s on rv.stcno=s.stcno inner join acv_mbr m on rv.mno=m.mno left outer join acv_mov mv on s.mvno=mv.mvno left outer join acv_tag_post tp on tp.rvno=rv.rvno left outer join acv_tag t on tp.tno=t.tno inner join (select fno, target from acv_flw where flwing_mbr=#{userNo} and fano=1)f on f.target=rv.mno left outer join (select target, lano, count(*) lk_length from acv_like where lano=1 group by lano, target)lk on lk.target=rv.rvno

select rv.rvno, rv.mno, rv.txt, rv.txt_x, rv.txt_y, rv.tfno, rv.txt_size, rv.rdt, rv.stat, s.stc_url, m.photo, m.nick, mv.title mvTitle, t.title, t.stat, f.fno, lk_length from acv_rv rv left outer join acv_stc s on rv.stcno=s.stcno inner join acv_mbr m on rv.mno=m.mno left outer join acv_mov mv on s.mvno=mv.mvno left outer join acv_tag_post tp on tp.rvno=rv.rvno left outer join acv_tag t on tp.tno=t.tno inner join (select fno, target from acv_flw where flwing_mbr=#{userNo} and fano=1)f on f.target=rv.mno left outer join (select target, lano, count(*) lk_length from acv_like where lano=1 group by lano, target)lk on lk.target=rv.rvno where rv.rvno=#{reviewNo}

and rv.rvno like concat('%', #{number}, '%')
and m.nick like concat('%', #{writerName}, '%')
and mv.title like concat('%', #{movieTitle}, '%')
and rv.stat like concat('%', #{status}, '%')
and rv.rdt like concat('%', #{registeredDate}, '%')
and rv.rdt between date(#{startDate}) and date(#{endDate})+1
and rv.rvno >= #{startNumber} and rv.rvno< #{endNumber}+1
and rv.stat = 1
and rv.stat = 0
order by rv.rvno desc

where rv.rvno like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or mv.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by rv.rvno desc

(rv.rvno like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.nick like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or mv.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
(rv.rvno like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.nick like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or mv.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
(mv.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
(m.nick like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
(rv.rvno like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
(rv.rvno like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.nick like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
(rv.rvno like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or mv.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
(m.nick like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or mv.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
order by rv.rvno desc
select tfno, name from acv_txt_font order by tfno asc
mapper.insert: insert into acv_rv(stcno, mno, txt, txt_x, txt_y, tfno, txt_size) values(#{stillCut}, #{writerNo}, #{text}, #{textX}, #{textY}, #{textFont}, #{textSize})
